name: As The Crow Flies (Dunbar Games)
description:
Controls
- Click on terrain features to interact with them.
- Chopping trees, building farms, and digging mines all require villagers and will give you resources.
- Upgrade villages and towns in order to gain more villagers!

Make your way across an infinitely* generated landscape with this simple, relaxing resource management game. As your avatar flies around the map, you must assign people to chop down trees, build farms, and dig mines. Using these resources you can then upgrade cities to give you access to even more people!

This project was completed over the course of a weekend, initially as part of Ludum Dare 40, but I strayed away from the theme as the game progressed.

*Landscape not guaranteed to be infinite.  But it'll be pretty darn close.
